name: Greenhome
description:
GREENHOME BETA

This game is in beta mode. It is unfinished, but has big plans for the future. Feedback and bug reports are appreciated.

Controls

WASD OR Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Confirm / Use Item

X - Cancel / Exit Menu

C - Open and Close Menu

Q - Cycle through inventory

The Game
  1. Greenhome is intended to be a calm, low stakes farming game
  2. You have cute animal friends! Buy seeds from Hubert and sell produce to Leonie!
  3. Go to the chest to find your tools.
  4. Use your bag for easy access to items.
  5. Hoe the wild grass to create gardening spaces.
  6. Cut small plants with your scythe.
  7. Drop seeds on soil, water them regularly, and spend the night in your tent to give them time to grow.
Probable Upcoming Features
  • New Art
  • New Plants
  • Time/Energy
  • Recipes
  • Balancing Soil Nutrients
  • Etc!
Known Bugs
  • Occasionally you go to remove a weed and end up staring into the void.
  • We forgot to add an easy way to close the game.
  • Sleeping in the tent only blanks out some of the screen
